alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 05 at 6:54AM MST until February 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH possible. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Converse County including Glenrock, Deer Creek, and Douglas. * WHEN...2 PM MST this afternoon until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
